nodes.text: Drextar Pym had a wife with whom he had two children, Dirv and Kyle. She was primarily addressed and referred to as "Mistress Pym". While on the way to a diplomatic conference, she experienced am assassination attempt against her husband which involved hijacking of a magnetic lift train and the kidnapping of her two sons. Eventually, a group of spacers saved the day and apprehended the would-be assassin.
